channel.title: Need to know how to change exp rates
channel.description:
i tried to find exp rate but it didnt come up with anythnig i needed if any1 could tell me a way to figure it out that would be sweet =]
i want to change the exp rate on the dummies, altar, and plant pots, and target to 10k a click

item.title: Need to know how to change exp rates
item.dc:creator: @lolplz lolplz
item.description:
@lolplz wrote:

What I’m talking about is making an Anti-mass npc system so people can’t mass anything, Then go in and add npc training, it makes your server much less laggy and it won’t dc people as much.

Read full topic
item.source: Need to know how to change exp rates

item.title: Need to know how to change exp rates
item.dc:creator: @Hockey4lifexx Hockey4lifexx
item.description:
@Hockey4lifexx wrote:

lolplz:

The simpler way to make a server and not have lag is build an anti-mass system and have npc training. Exactly what i did!

wtf r u talking about

ill pk ur as:

alright make another acc a nub one and hit the dummy once and check how much exp it gave you. now after your done with that open up client.java and search for the exp it gave you. CTRL+F then enter the number

shoulda thought of that thnx =D

Read full topic
item.source: Need to know how to change exp rates
